channel.title: iq-retail on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in iq-retail on Stock2Shop

item.title: iQ Retail
item.description: Create orders on iQ Retail This allows Stock2Shop to create an order on iQ Retail when an order has been received from your sales channel(s). Sync Product Images When integrating with iQ Retail, we can pull Images associated with the relevant Products into Stock2shop. These Images will be applied to the Products and will be added to the Webstore when the Product is synced through. Push Products We can update your Product data from iQ Retail in 3 minute intervals.
